name: Stopfraud.eu
goal:
To prevent illiberal governments to abuse EU funds to build their clientele.
To achieve that EU institutions control attribution of projects and contracts and payments in advance if there are risks
interests: Budget, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, Regional Policy
euInitiatives:
Convincing MEPs to support better control of EU funds
Binding structural funds to rule of law
Protection of the Union's financial interests
